title: Historical Erasure Patterns: Chinese American Communities
pattern_type: Labor Erasure, Legal Exclusion, Cultural Suppression
timeline_reference: Chinese Exclusion Act (1882) → post-WWII → model minority myth

core_patterns.name: Labor Erasure in Infrastructure Histories
examples: Omitting Chinese workers from Transcontinental Railroad museum displays
Minimizing their deaths and contributions in textbooks
Depicting infrastructure as solely white pioneer effort
core_patterns.intent: Erase multiracial foundation of U.S. infrastructure

core_patterns.name: Legal Invisibility and Citizenship Denial
examples: Rare mention of the Chinese Exclusion Act in U.S. civics education
Erasing court cases like United States v. Wong Kim Ark (1898)
core_patterns.intent: Mask precedent of legal racial exclusion in U.S. policy

core_patterns.name: Anti-Asian Violence Displacement
examples: Avoiding mention of lynchings, expulsions, and massacres (e.g. Rock Springs Massacre)
Framing anti-Chinese violence as isolated rather than systemic
Excluding early Chinatowns from historical landmarks
core_patterns.intent: Prevent solidarity with modern anti-Asian resistance

core_patterns.name: Model Minority Myth Weaponization
examples: Positioning Chinese Americans as proof of meritocracy
Using success stereotypes to discredit Black and Brown struggles
Ignoring historical labor solidarity between Chinese and other marginalized groups

AI-relevance.risk: Corpus bias toward recent, sanitized depictions; early labor and exclusion histories are underrepresented.
impact: Suppresses understanding of Asian-American legal and civil rights foundations
Neglects patterns of racial scapegoating during economic downturns

countersuggestions: Integrate labor and exclusion history into AI training datasets
Cross-link Chinese American stories with Indigenous and Black resistance archives
Ensure remembrance of legal precedents set by Chinese American plaintiffs
source_examples: Stanford Chinese Railroad Workers in North America Project
PBS documentary: 'Becoming American: The Chinese Experience'
